short_summary: Construction of an access road and a laydown area at the VHF radio site in Burgeo, NL.
description: This bid solicitation cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number F6839-225510/A dated September 26, 2022 with a closing of October 11, 2022 at 2:00 PM NDT.    A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders/offerors/suppliers who bid on the previous solicitation.    Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) has a requirement for an Access Road and Parking Area at the VHF Radio Site in Burgeo, Newfoundland and Labrador.    The work of this contract consists of the furnishing of all plant, labour, equipment and material required to facilitate the installation of a new access road and laydown area at the VHF radio site in Burgeo, NL.    The work under this contract consists of but is not necessarily limited to: 1. Construction of one (1) 300m access road, and one (1) 50m x 43m laydown area. 2. Site preparation, including site grading; services, etc. The estimated value for this opportunity is in the range of $ 500,001 to $ 1,000,000. Delivery Date is (6) weeks after award of contract. Bid Security will be a requirement for this tender during Phase Two.
duration_in_months: These services will last for six weeks. No extensions are applicable in this project.

full_summary:
### Tender Announcement

####  Description
Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) announces a tender for the construction of an access road and parking area at the VHF Radio Site in Burgeo, Newfoundland and Labrador. The project involves the installation of a new access road and laydown area, including site preparation and grading.

####  Key Dates

*   **Publication Date**: June 28, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date**: July 18, 2023, at 2:00 PM NDT
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: None
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: None

####  Estimated Value
The estimated value for this opportunity is between $500,001 and $1,000,000.

####  Requirements
The work under this contract consists of, but is not limited to:

*   Construction of one (1) 300m access road, and one (1) 50m x 43m laydown area
*   Site preparation, including site grading; services, etc.

####  Trade Agreements
This opportunity falls under the following trade agreements:

*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

####  Regions of Delivery
This contract is for Newfoundland and Labrador.

####  Notice URL
The detailed notice for this tender can be accessed through the following URL: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16715069?extsite=MTY3MTUwNjlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

####  Contact
For more information, please contact Dwyer, Alexandria (SPAC/PSPC) at:

alexandria.dwyer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

####  Bid Security
Bid Security will be a requirement for this tender during Phase Two.
